project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up project structure and dependencies
Implement function to fetch weather data from the public API
Implement function to parse the API response and extract temperature, humidity, and conditions
Implement function to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather fetching and display functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
